description:
Fullstack Engineer - Security Cleared 
Salary Rate: $80-100/hour 
6 month contract (with possibility to extend) 
Remote 

Come work for an up-and-coming startup helping create the future of AI-powered platforms. The role is a Fullstack Python Developer to join a dynamic team, building and maintaining simple web applications. 

The Company 
This company uses AI-powered analytics to help streamline data dashboards. They serve both commercial markets and the public sector, helping organizations use Generative AI to capture insights on data.  

The Role 
As a Fullstack Python Developer, you will design and develop sophisticated web applications using Python and Flask and use various data science libraries. Your day-to-day will include: 

Creating data platforms with Python, Flask, and data science tools like Pandas. 
Building web-apps with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. 

Skills & Experience: 
The successful Full Stack Engineer will  
Active TS/SCI clearance.  
Extensive experience with Python, Flask, Django, and FastAPI.  
Proficiency in Pandas, NumPy, and SciPy.  
Strong front-end development skills (HTML, CSS, JavaScript).  
Familiarity with SQL, MongoDB, and data modeling.  
Excellent problem-solving and communication skills. 

Salary
$80-100/hour depending on experience 

How to apply 
Please register your interest by sending your resume to Elizabeth Dodge via the Apply link on this page.

qualifications.required: Active TS/SCI clearance, Extensive experience with Python, Flask, Django, and FastAPI, Proficiency in Pandas, NumPy, and SciPy, Strong front-end development skills (HTML, CSS, JavaScript), Familiarity with SQL, MongoDB, and data modeling, Excellent problem-solving and communication skills
